授業目的: The purpose of this course is to provide more specific instruction on research methodology in the field of applied linguistics and cultural studies, so that students gain better knowledge of the many research methods they can choose from when designing their own research. This course also focuses on research design and academic writing skills. Since students must write their graduation thesis in English, this course will help them better achieve that goal.
到達目標: Students will have a hands-on experience in this course, learning how to conduct different types of research and how to analyze their own research results.
授業方法:
THIS COURSE WILL BE CONDUCTED ONLINE!!!
In this course, the means of instruction is English.

トピック.授業計画1: The instructor will guide students in learning researching skills and academic writing skills.
トピック.授業外学習2: Two to three hours of out-of-class work can be expected weekly.
